pages.title: Vault Recycler
pages.text: VH2.5 features the $(#033dfc)Vault Recycler$()!$(br)Using this item ported from Vault Hunters 3rd Edition, you can recycle your gear efficiently and conveniently for more scrap rewards!$(br2)Additionally allows for you to recycle $(#033dfc)Etchings$() & $(#033dfc)Vault Magnets$()
